data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 24,667 believers in Olt and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Olt, Romania
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Olt.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who are far from you in Olt. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 340,310 people in the state of Olt who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Tatar, Crimean people.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Olt words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Olt, Romania to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 24,667 believers in Olt, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

location.name: Olt
location.people_groups_list: Kazakh, Uzbek, Northern, South Asian, general, Turk, Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking
